profile.name: Gordon Lew
profile.title: FE Developer & TeamLead TW @ WAION IT
profile.content: I am a front-end engineer with 2.5 years of experience, currently serving as a Team Leader. I regularly organize code reviews with colleagues on weekends, demonstrating a strong sense of responsibility and excellent communication skills with both superiors and team members. I am capable of conducting meetings in Cantonese, Mandarin, and English. I have never delayed a task and excel at managing task quality, resolving bugs, and planning project directions.

skill.text5: Deeply familiar, more good in RTK

job.title: Work Experience
job.jobDesc1:
• Job Description:
  • - Handle customer-reported issues
  • - Manage upward and downward collaboration and communication quality
  • - Manage subordinatesâ€™ issues and handle personnel matters
  • - Utilize tools such as React, Next.js, Node.js
  • - Dynamically manage and create an exceptional customer experience
  • - Compress and streamline code
job.project1:
• Project 1: www.141.HK:
  • - Assisted in updating the new UI and managed all transaction animations, including QR code scanning and top-up animations.
  • - Completed the profile image upload process and Profile UI.
  • - Designed the search flow.
  • - Optimized and organized the entire website workflow.
  • Project 2: AEC Admin CMS:
  • - Configured project settings from the start.
  • - Designed custom components for team use.
  • - Developed APIs and used JSON-server for mock deployment.
  • - Initiated code reviews to ensure consistent design across the project.
  • - Simulated Next.js SSR environment with React, ensuring clean code.
  • Project 3: AEC Main Website:
  • - Designed web animations.
  • - Created a custom scrolling flow without using any plugins.
  • - Developed core website flow design.
  • - Connected to JSON-server for API simulation and design.
job.jobDesc2:
• Job Description:
  • - Collaborated with UI Designers on Interface Design and Implementation
  • - Integrated APIs and adhered to TypeScript standards
  • - Built custom websites from scratch to meet specific requirements
  • - Customized UX requirements and operational flows for custom categories
  • - Developed a complete UX and responsive design across pages (e.g.,index,cart,single product,etc.)
  • - Collaborated with designers to update multiple projects, including PHP and React Native
  • - Cooperated with backend teams to establish API standards and design specifications
  • - Developed reusable custom hooks for data aggregation, custom buttons, and various input types
  • - Managed personnel tasks, allocated responsibilities, and regularly discussed and reported project progress with CTO and PM
job.project2:
• Project 1: Hantap React Native Development:
  • - Maintained two websites, primarily focusing on UI updates, content adjustments, and version upgrades.
  • - Project 2: Senyro Sushi HK/JP
  • - Collaborated with the Tech Lead and team from scratch to develop various UIs and functionalities.
  • - Personally responsible for developing pages such as PLP (Product Listing Page), PDP (Product Detail Page), Cart, Add-On, Checkout, and Order Complete.
  • - Technologies used: Next.js, RTK, TailwindCSS, i18next, axios, among others.
  • - Developed global hooks, customized UX and hooks for the index page, custom sliders, optimized loaders, and diverse add-to-cart logic.
job.jobDesc3:
• Job Description:
  • - Responsible for all aspects of video production, including creative brainstorming, YouTube projects, video post-production, YouTube thumbnail design (graphics), animation production, and media management.
  • - Oversaw video quality control and distribution.
  • - Maintained video standards and quality, including overall style consistency.
